section.title: Question
section.p: How can I force the to save the XML with zero indent size and not to break the line inside block elements?

section.title: Answer
section.p: Usually, in a standalone version of , the Editor Format and Editor Format XML preferences pages allow you to control the way the XML is saved on the disk after you edit it in the Author mode.
Also, the APIAccessibleOptionTags interface contains a list of all accessible keys that can be read or set from the options.
